frames.text: You find yourself deep inside a forest. When you look behind you, there's no sign of the doorway you just came through. The sun seems to be setting and it's dark beneath the trees.

options.text: Head straight ahead, through the trees.
Retrace your steps. Maybe you can find out more about the vanished building.

frames.text: You walk through the trees as it gets darker. You see endless forest but no paths.
You investigate the forest behind you, but you can only see pine trees and thick undergrowth. Suddenly, you hear a menacing roar in the twilight.
